review_data.title: Most authentic Indian food in Europe
review_data.content: Went there for a evening dinner with frnds last nite. We spoke to the chef before the order and he undestood where we came from. When the food came, it was not the european custom indian food, but authentic tasting indian food - the best...More

review_data.title: Not impressed

review_data.title: it was ok!
review_data.content: Its situated in Seebach in Zurich. The food was ok kind. Little improvement in the taste and service is recommended.

review_data.title: Very good!
review_data.content: I was definitely surprised by this restaurant - kind service and very good Indian food! Definitely suggested

review_data.title: AMAZING FOOD LIKE IN INDIA
review_data.content: I was in this Indian restaurant yesterday after a face book recommendation for dinner to celebrate my friends birthday. The food was very tasty and amazing.We ordered the Tasting menu with dessert.. CHF 39.50 per person. ( Tikka masala and Lentils were the best.)Plus a...More

review_data.title: Great food, great service
review_data.content: We went to the Ganges on a Thursday evening, there was no buffet available but we had the "tasting menu" (38.5 CHF per person). The menu included an appetizer plate (2 vegetarians and 1 non vegetarian entrees), 3 different curries (we had beef, fish and...More

review_data.title: Friendly People, Fantastic Food
review_data.content: Newly opened The Ganges is the best Indian restaurant i've been to in Switzerland in the 5 years i've lived here. The staff where friendly and helpful, speaking both German and English. The food portions where excellant and the quality was top! I had the...More

review_data.title: Great Food, Great Service - highly recommend
review_data.content: From the outside The Ganges looks like nothing special, however once inside its homely and welcoming. We went on a wednesday night when they had their A La Carte menu on - the food was delicious, bar far the best indian we've been to in...More

review_data.title: Good food and friendly service
review_data.content: We went there on a Saturday evening without reservation. The owner was very friendly and found us a table. Unfortunately in the weekends there's only a buffet, you can't order from the menu. The buffet (it costed 32.5 CHF, I think) includes an appetizer plate,...More

review_data.title: Delicious food and excellent service
review_data.content: I Have been to this restaurant as well. It indeed great food and very friendly service and clean decor. Finally fair prices.
